wikipedia_page.main: Abdallah bin Fathallah bin Nasrallah Marrash (Arabic: عبد الله بن فتح الله بن نصر الله مرّاش, ALA-LC: ʻAbd Allāh bin Fatḥ Allāh bin Naṣr Allāh Marrāsh; 14 May 1839 –  January 17, 1900) was a Syrian writer involved in various Arabic-language newspaper ventures in London and Paris.
